trans-unit.source: CDN Caching Policy in Media Services Extension
trans-unit.target: CDN Caching Policy in Media Services Extension

trans-unit.source: This topic gives an overview of a CDM caching policy in Media Services Extension.
trans-unit.target: This topic gives an overview of a CDM caching policy in Media Services Extension.

trans-unit.source: CDN Caching Policy in Media Services Extension
trans-unit.target: CDN Caching Policy in Media Services Extension

trans-unit.source: Azure Media Services provides HTTP based Adaptive Streaming and progressive download.
trans-unit.target: Azure Media Services provides HTTP based Adaptive Streaming and progressive download.

trans-unit.source: HTTP based streaming is highly scalable with benefits of caching in proxy and CDN layers as well as client side caching.
trans-unit.target: HTTP based streaming is highly scalable with benefits of caching in proxy and CDN layers as well as client side caching.

trans-unit.source: Streaming endpoints provides general streaming capabilities and also configuration for HTTP cache headers.
trans-unit.target: Streaming endpoints provides general streaming capabilities and also configuration for HTTP cache headers.

trans-unit.source: Streaming endpoints sets HTTP Cache-Control: max-age and Expires headers.
trans-unit.target: Streaming endpoints sets HTTP Cache-Control: max-age and Expires headers.

trans-unit.source: You can get more information for HTTP cache headers from [W3.org](http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec13.html).
trans-unit.target: You can get more information for HTTP cache headers from [W3.org](http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec13.html).

trans-unit.source: Default Caching headers
trans-unit.target: Default Caching headers

trans-unit.source: By default streaming-endpoints apply 3 day cache headers for on-demand streaming data (actual media fragments/chunks) and manifest(playlist).
trans-unit.target: By default streaming-endpoints apply 3 day cache headers for on-demand streaming data (actual media fragments/chunks) and manifest(playlist).

trans-unit.source: For live streaming, streaming endpoints apply 3 day cache headers for data (actual media fragments/chunks) and 2 seconds cache header for manifest(playlist) requests.
trans-unit.target: For live streaming, streaming endpoints apply 3 day cache headers for data (actual media fragments/chunks) and 2 seconds cache header for manifest(playlist) requests.

trans-unit.source: When live program turns to on-demand (live archive) then on-demand streaming cache headers apply.
trans-unit.target: When live program turns to on-demand (live archive) then on-demand streaming cache headers apply.

trans-unit.source: Azure CDN integration
trans-unit.target: Azure CDN integration

trans-unit.source: Azure Media services provides [integrated CDN](http://azure.microsoft.com/updates/azure-media-services-now-fully-integrated-with-azure-cdn/) for streaming-endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Azure Media services provides [integrated CDN](http://azure.microsoft.com/updates/azure-media-services-now-fully-integrated-with-azure-cdn/) for streaming-endpoints.

trans-unit.source: Cache-control headers applies in the same way as streaming endpoints to CDN enabled streaming endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Cache-control headers applies in the same way as streaming endpoints to CDN enabled streaming endpoints.

trans-unit.source: Azure CDN uses streaming endpoint configured cache values to define the life time of the internally cached objects and also uses this value to set the delivery cache headers.
trans-unit.target: Azure CDN uses streaming endpoint configured cache values to define the life time of the internally cached objects and also uses this value to set the delivery cache headers.

trans-unit.source: When using CDN enabled streaming endpoints it is not recommended to set small cache values.
trans-unit.target: When using CDN enabled streaming endpoints it is not recommended to set small cache values.

trans-unit.source: Setting small values will decrease the performance and reduce the benefit of CDN.
trans-unit.target: Setting small values will decrease the performance and reduce the benefit of CDN.

trans-unit.source: It is not allowed to set cache headers smaller than 600 seconds for CDN enabled streaming endpoints.
trans-unit.target: It is not allowed to set cache headers smaller than 600 seconds for CDN enabled streaming endpoints.

trans-unit.source: Configuring cache headers with Azure Media Services
trans-unit.target: Configuring cache headers with Azure Media Services

trans-unit.source: You can use Azure Management portal or Azure Media Services APIs to configure cache header values.
trans-unit.target: You can use Azure Management portal or Azure Media Services APIs to configure cache header values.

trans-unit.source: To configure cache headers using management portal please refer to [How to Manage Streaming Endpoints](../media-services-manage-origins.md) section Configuring the Streaming Endpoint.
trans-unit.target: To configure cache headers using management portal please refer to [How to Manage Streaming Endpoints](../media-services-manage-origins.md) section Configuring the Streaming Endpoint.

trans-unit.source: Azure Media Services REST API, [StreamingEndpoint](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn783468.aspx#StreamingEndpointCacheControl).
trans-unit.target: Azure Media Services REST API, [StreamingEndpoint](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn783468.aspx#StreamingEndpointCacheControl).

trans-unit.source: Azure Media Services .NET SDK, [StreamingEndpointCacheControl Properties](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=615302).
trans-unit.target: Azure Media Services .NET SDK, [StreamingEndpointCacheControl Properties](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=615302).

trans-unit.source: Cache configuration precedence order
trans-unit.target: Cache configuration precedence order

trans-unit.source: Azure Media Services configured cache value overrides default value.
trans-unit.target: Azure Media Services configured cache value overrides default value.

trans-unit.source: If there is no manual configuration, default values applies.
trans-unit.target: If there is no manual configuration, default values applies.

trans-unit.source: By default 2 seconds cache headers applies to live streaming manifest(playlist) regardless of Azure Media or Azure Storage configuration and overriding of this value is not available.
trans-unit.target: By default 2 seconds cache headers applies to live streaming manifest(playlist) regardless of Azure Media or Azure Storage configuration and overriding of this value is not available.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
